https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/v8GJkGJBA7fb9I7ImdiphVxlzm6.jpg In a land beset by endless strife, nothing must get in the way of the preservation of honour - even if that means sacrificing a loved one. Mena, a young, beautiful bride-to-be, lives in a small, remote village in northern Afghanistan, a harsh landscape that still shimmers with breathtaking colours. Respecting the deeply conservative local customs, she and her fianc√©, Rahmat, have little contact yet cherish a special bond. Act of Dishonour
